card_text: Once per turn: You can Ritual Summon 1 WIND Ritual Monster from your Deck, by Tributing Spirit monsters and/or "Shinobird Token(s)" from your field, whose total Levels equal or exceed the Ritual Monster's Level. Twice per turn, if a face-up WIND monster(s) you control is returned to your hand (except during the Damage Step): You can activate 1 of these effects;$N●Add 1 of your Spirit monsters or Ritual Spells that is banished or in your GY to your hand.$N●Set 1 "Stars Align across the Milky Way" directly from your Deck.
